about_the_game:
This DLC includes all Bike in Miolhria!
This Includes the...

Basic Petal Bike
Basic bike is good for getting around but has very high break rate!

Durability: 20/20

Craft: Workbench

Repair: Place item on Bike hook and fix, Boles Bike Shop

Find: Unknown...Find parts and craft

Superior Petal Bike
The Superior Petal bike is good for getting around and has storage.

Durability: 30/30

Craft: Workbench

Repair: Place item on Bike hook and fix, Boles Bike Shop

Find: Unknown...Find parts and craft

Flash Petal Bike

Mining Bikes
Durability: 15/15

Craft: Workbench

Repair: Bole's Bike Shop

Find: Unknown
Tunnel Bikes
Durability: 15/15

Craft: Workbench

Repair: Bole's Bike Shop

Find: Unknown

The Bike Shop DLC includes Bikes of Miolhria. This pack will allow you to start with these bikes without finding or crafting them. Keep in mind when they break you will have to repair them!
After Purchase make you way to Oak Town Trader(once they open). From here you will find the Export Computer to claim your New Bikes!

name: Miolhr Starting Bikes DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Windows 7, Windows 8+
  • Processor: AMD & Intel Processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The Bike Shop DLC includes all Bikes of Miolhria. This pack will allow you to start with these bikes without finding or crafting them. Keep in mind when they break you will have to repair them!
